languages.text: В самом сердце Футфола вершится странная церемония. Что ждет случайного гостя в этом месте?
A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?
languages.original_text: В самом сердце Футфола вершится странная церемония. Что ждет случайного гостя в этом месте?

traits.locale_text: A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?
A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?
A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?
A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?

languages.text: 落脚港的核心区域举行了一场古怪的聚会。如果行商浪人打算参加这场聚会，届时会发生什么事情呢？
languages.original_text: A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?

traits.locale_text: 落脚港的核心区域举行了一场古怪的聚会。如果行商浪人打算参加这场聚会，届时会发生什么事情呢？

languages.text: フットフォールの中心部で奇妙な儀式が行われている。自由開拓者が訴訟に参加することを決めたら何が起きるのだろうか？
languages.original_text: A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?

traits.locale_text: フットフォールの中心部で奇妙な儀式が行われている。自由開拓者が訴訟に参加することを決めたら何が起きるのだろうか？

languages.text: Se está celebrando una ceremonia extraña en el corazón de Paso. ¿Qué ocurrirá si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente decide unirse a ella?
languages.original_text: A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?

traits.locale_text: Se está celebrando una ceremonia extraña en el corazón de Paso. ¿Qué ocurrirá si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente decide unirse a ella?

languages.text: Im Zentrum von Footfall findet eine seltsame Zeremonie statt. Was wohl passieren wird, wenn sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} der Zeremonie anschließt?
languages.original_text: A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?

traits.locale_text: Im Zentrum von Footfall findet eine seltsame Zeremonie statt. Was wohl passieren wird, wenn sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} der Zeremonie anschließt?

languages.text: Une étrange cérémonie se déroule en plein cœur de Castel. Que se passera-t-il si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} décide de se joindre à la procession ?
languages.original_text: A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?

traits.locale_text: Une étrange cérémonie se déroule en plein cœur de Castel. Que se passera-t-il si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} décide de se joindre à la procession ?

languages.text: Binliman'ın kalbinde tuhaf bir tören gerçekleştiriliyor. Merasime ya Hür Tacir de katılmaya karar verirse?
languages.original_text: A strange ceremony is taking place in the heart of Footfall. What will happen if the Rogue Trader decides to join the proceedings?

traits.locale_text: Binliman'ın kalbinde tuhaf bir seremoni gerçekleştiriliyor. Hür Tacir sürece dâhil olmaya karar verirse ne olur?
